azurerm_storage_share.description: Manages a File Share within Azure Storage.

name.description: The name of the share. Must be unique within the storage account where the share is located.

storage_account_name.description: Specifies the storage account in which to create the share.

acl.description: One or more `acl` blocks as defined below.

quota.description: The maximum size of the share, in gigabytes. For Standard storage accounts, this must be greater than 0 and less than 5120 GB (5 TB). For Premium FileStorage storage accounts, this must be greater than 100 GB and less than 102400 GB (100 TB). Default is 5120.

metadata.description: A mapping of MetaData for this File Share.

id.description: The ID which should be used for this Shared Identifier.

expiry.description: The ISO8061 UTC time at which this Access Policy should be valid until.

permissions.description: The permissions which should associated with this Shared Identifier.

start.description: The ISO8061 UTC time at which this Access Policy should be valid from.

id.description: The ID of the File Share.

resource_manager_id.description: The Resource Manager ID of this File Share.

url.description: The URL of the File Share

create.description: Used when creating the Storage Share.

update.description: Used when updating the Storage Share.

read.description: Used when retrieving the Storage Share.

delete.description: Used when deleting the Storage Share.
